classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: 覆盖或扩展应用于组件的样式。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 CSS 类 API。

color.description: The color of the component. It supports both default and custom theme colors, which can be added as shown in the palette customization guide.
color.description_zh: 组件的颜色。它支持默认和自定义主题颜色，可以按照调色板自定义指南中所示进行添加。
color.type: inherit| primary| secondary| success| error| info| warning| string

component.description: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
component.description_zh: 用于根节点的组件。使用 HTML 元素或组件的字符串。

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled.
disabled.description_zh: 如果为 true，则禁用该组件。

disableElevation.description: If true, no elevation is used.
disableElevation.description_zh: 如果为 true，则不使用高程。

disableFocusRipple.description: If true, the  keyboard focus ripple is disabled.
disableFocusRipple.description_zh: 如果为 true，则禁用键盘焦点波纹。

disableRipple.description: If true, the ripple effect is disabled.⚠️ Without a ripple there is no styling for :focus-visible by default. Be sure to highlight the element by applying separate styles with the .Mui-focusVisible class.
disableRipple.description_zh: 如果为 true，则禁用涟漪效应。 ⚠️ 如果没有涟漪，则默认情况下没有 ：focus-visible 的样式。请务必通过使用 应用单独的样式来突出显示元素。Mui-focusVisible 类。

fullWidth.description: If true, the button will take up the full width of its container.
fullWidth.description_zh: 如果为 true，则该按钮将占用其容器的整个宽度。

href.description: The URL to link to when the button is clicked. If defined, an a element will be used as the root node.
href.description_zh: 单击按钮时要链接到的 URL。如果定义，则 a 元素将用作根节点。

size.description: The size of the component. small is equivalent to the dense button styling.
size.description_zh: 组件的大小。Small 等同于密集的按钮样式。

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式的系统属性。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。
